reviews.name: The Golden Lily
reviews.reviewText: Love this series. Adrian is so funny.
reviews.title: Great read. Great Author

reviews.name: The Golden Lily
reviews.reviewText:
I ordered the WALMART exclusive edition, which was supposed to contain the first chapter of the next book—The Indigo Spell.
That's not what I received. They sent me a regular copy of the book—which I already had
reviews.title: Book was great- Walmart was not

reviews.name: The Golden Lily
reviews.reviewText: its great I was kinda worried that it wasnt gonna be good but its great. I didnt want it to ever end. The only problem is that I found it kinda short Im hoping Richelle Mead writes the next one soon
reviews.title: 09 July 2012

reviews.name: The Golden Lily
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely LOVED the Vampire Academy series and I was so sad that it was ending. Then later I found out about Bloodlines and that it was a spin-off series and I got super excited. I was afraid it wasn't going to live up to the greatest of Vampire Academy but Bloodlines is just as great in it's own way. I also love that some of the characters from VA show up in Bloodlines. I'm in LOVE with this series can't wait for book 3!!!
reviews.title: Richelle Mead is Incredible

reviews.name: The Golden Lily
reviews.reviewText: What can I say? Awesome! At first I didn't really like Sydney's charater coz she's so up tight but thats the way she was brought up. But she is starting to loosen up more which is great! Her and Adrian are getting closer, but she is still afraid. Can't wait for the next one!
reviews.title: Sage and Adrian Chemistry is getting there!
